title: UPSCENE! logo font
content:
Hi friend

Help me id the font used for UPSCENE! logo please

Thanks in advance

Migue

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317115109im_/http:/typophile.com/files/upscene_5308.jpg)
author: hernando

comments.content: Not sure, but there are various fonts in this comicbook horror style: [Monster Mash](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317115109/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/comicraft/monstermash_international_regular_ot/?sample_text=upscene!&sample_size=74), [Men of Science](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317115109/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/blambot/men-of-science/?refby=typographica), [Destination Unknown](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317115109/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/device_fonts/destination_unknown/?sample_text=UPSCENE!&sample_size=74) and [Agent of the Uncanny](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317115109/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/device_fonts/agent_of_the_uncanny/?sample_text=UPSCENE!&sample_size=74).

I think this is [Feast of Flesh](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317115109/http:/www.blambot.com/font_fof.shtml) from Blambot.

- Lex
